thread.section_title: Dyers RV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dyers RV | dyersonline.com
thread.title: Charles

author: Charles
title: Charles
text: I called to purchase a new replacement fabric for my awning which I had measured to get the appropriate size, but wanted to double check with the model number on unit. The only problem was that some of the number had worn off. When I texted a pic of the plate and provided the model fifth wheel that I had, they confirmed my selection and provided the complete awning model number. They then proceeded to ship the unit to me for free at a price that was significantly lower than the competition. Also, it was in my hands 3 days after ordering!
